clauses.title: Private messages can be read (but not employed for advertising)
clauses.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text:
We may review, scan, or analyse the messages you exchange with other members of our community through our Platforms for fraud prevention, service improvement, customer support purposes, enforcement of the contracts entered into with our members (such as our Terms and Conditions). For example, in order to prevent the circumventing of our online booking system, we may scan and analyse messages sent through our Platforms to check that they do not include any contact details or references to other websites.

5.2. We will never scan or analyse your messages with other members of our community for commercial and advertising purposes. We may use automated methods to carry out the moderation of these messages, but no automated individual decision-making is performed in this regard.

case.text: Private messages can be read

clauses.title: Sensitive data is collected and shared to target advertising
clauses.description: Sensitive data refers to information requiring special protection, such as health data, political and religious beliefs, ethnic origins, sexual life and financial information. The service collects and shares this data with third parties for advertising or marketing.
clauses.clause_text: Financial information, for instance, may be shared with insurance companies or advertising partners.

case.text: Sensitive data is collected and shared to target advertising

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
2.1.2. A photograph;
  • 2.1.3. A postal address;
  • 2.1.4. Details on your cars;
  • 2.1.5. Your mini-biography;
  • 2.1.6. A record of any correspondence between you and us;
  • 2.1.7. A record of any bookings you have made or trip related advertisements you have placed with or through our Platforms;
  • 2.1.8. Details of accounting or financial transactions including transactions carried out through our Platforms or otherwise. This may include information such as your payment card or bank account details, details of trips or legs you have booked or offered through our Platforms;
  • 2.1.9. Details of your visits to our Platforms and the resources that you access;

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Please note that BlaBlaCar is using the services of third parties to learn about your usage of this website to optimize your user experience and to show you advertising outside of this website. These third parties (including, for example, advertising networks and providers of external services like web traffic analysis services) may also use cookies, over which we have no control.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation (ensurance and advertising companies)
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text: our business partners who may advertise our services on their websites;

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: information about your visit including the URL clickstream to, through and from our Platforms

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: In accordance with applicable laws and where required with your consent, we may combine information about you, including your Personal Data and cookie information, we send to and receive from our business partners.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: ;to send you, in accordance with applicable laws and where required, with your consent, marketing materials and information necessary to facilitate the service or the booking process and to make you suggestions and recommendations about goods or services related to our services that may interest you.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (UK)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: These T&Cs are written in English and subject to English law.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons and tracking pixels
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: BlaBlaCar also uses similar technologies for tracking including “pixel”, “tracking scripts” or “software development kits” (known as SDKs).

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If BlaBlaCar or all or part of its assets are acquired by a third party, in which case Personal Data held by it about its members will be one of the transferred assets.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.
clauses.clause_text: Your replies to any surveys or questionnaires, such as your reviews on the trips you have shared with other members of our community. Such information may be used for analytic &. user understanding purposes;

case.text: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

clauses.title: Per the service's terms, you may not express negative opinions about them
clauses.description: Criticising, questioning, making objections or complaints about the Service, its staff or anything related to it is prohibited and constitutes a breach of the Terms.
clauses.clause_text: If posted content damages the image of BlaBlaCar, then they have the right to remove it without notice.

case.text: Per the service's terms, you may not express negative opinions about them

clauses.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: We also use your data to target you in order to serve our ads on social media platforms.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: • our sub-contractors in technical, payment, identity verification and delivery services, or analytics providers.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: In principle, we store the Personal Data that we hold about you in the European Union (“EU“). However, since for example some of our service providers are based in countries outside of the European Union (“third countries”), we also transfer some of your data to third countries. This may include third countries where the European Commission has not taken the decision that such third country ensures an adequate level of protection (for example the United States)

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
• Performance cookies:

    • These cookies help us learn which pages are most and least popular, and what content is most useful to our users. They help us improve our platforms’ performance by making sure users can easily find what they are looking for, for example. These cookies may be set by us or our analytics partners.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You may request the deletion of personal data or the correction of inaccurate personal data (your right to erasure and rectification).

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: This right notably includes the option to make modifications to the formatting of your Member Content, with respect for your moral right, for the purposes of respecting the graphics charter of the Platform and/or making it technically compatible with a view to its publication via the Platform.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text:
Except regarding the categories of Personal Data mentioned in clauses 2.3.2 and 2.3.3 below, your Personal Data will be stored for the duration of your relationship with us and then put beyond use:

  • 5 years after your last use of our Platform, if you did not close your account;
  • 1 year after the closing of your account, except if you received a negative rating or report, in which case your Personal Data is stored for either (i) a 2-year period following the latest negative rating or report, or (ii) 1 year after the closing of your account, whichever is longer.

2.3.2.The following categories of Personal Data may be stored for different durations:

  • Financial data (e.g. payments, reimbursements, etc.) is stored for the duration required by applicable tax and accounting laws;
  • All user-generated content (e.g. comments and ratings) is anonymised but remains available on our Platforms.

2.3.3. In the event that your account is suspended or blocked, we will keep your data for a period of between 2 and 10 years in order to prevent you from circumventing the rules applying to our Platforms.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You are entitled to receive a copy of your personal data that is in our possession (your right of data access).

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.
clauses.clause_text: In order to enable the provision of the Services, and in compliance with the purpose of the Platform, you grant BlaBlaCar a non-exclusive licence to use the content and data you provide in the context of your use of the Services (hereinafter referred to as your “Member Content”). I

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: For electronic marketing communications: You can withdraw your consent at any time by (i) unticking the relevant box in your member account, (ii) clicking on the unsubscribe link we provide in each BlaBlaCar communication sent to your attention or (iii) contacting us using the contact details provided in section 13 below.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
clauses.clause_text: you authorise BlaBlaCar to reproduce all or part of your Member Content on any digital recording media, known or as yet unknown, and notably on any server, hard disk, memory card, or any other equivalent media, in any format and by any process, known or as yet unknown, to the extent necessary to any operation of storage, backup, transmission or download linked to the operation of the Platform and the provision of the Service;

case.text: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Applicable as of 15 June 2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: You recognise and accept that BlaBlaCar reserves the right not to publish or to delete any review, any question, any comment or any response if it deems its content breaches these T&Cs.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: Furthermore, BlaBlaCar reserves the right to modify or suspend all or part of access to the Platform or its functionalities, at its sole discretion, temporarily or permanently.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.
clauses.clause_text: not to open more than one Account on the Platform

case.text: Alternative accounts are not allowed

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: The Platform may be used by individuals

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: BlaBlaCar reserves the right to suspend your Account, limit your access to the Services, or terminate these T&Cs in the case where (i) you have received at least three reviews and (ii) the average review you have received is less than or equal to 3.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: you represent and warrant that you are aged 18 or over.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.
clauses.clause_text: Mandatory information required to register for the service we provide on our Platforms or to access other services provided by us, including your name, email address, date of birth, gender, mobile phone number and a password.

case.text: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: BlaBlaCar cannot guarantee the truthfulness, reliability or validity of the information subject of the verification procedure.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
With regard to each of your visits to our Platforms we may collect, in accordance with applicable laws and where required with your consent, information relating to the devices you use and the networks you are connected to when using our services.
This may include the following information: your IP address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text: BlaBlaCar may modify these T&Cs in order to adapt to its technological and commercial environment, and to comply with the legislation in force. Any modification to these T&Cs will be published on the Platform with mention of the date of effect, and you will be notified by BlaBlaCar before it takes effect.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
